title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.56 - Capital expenditure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.56 - Capital expenditure

State Regulations

An expenditure intended to benefit future periods, in
contrast to a revenue expenditure, which benefits a current period; an addition
to a capital asset. The term is generally restricted to expenditures that add
fixed-asset units or that have the effect of increasing the capacity, efficiency, life span, or economy of operation of an existing fixed
asset. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.56

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
